attributes.action: to force the government to remove liberal ideology from the prison service and start punishing wrongdoers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This includes removing all the personal effects from cells, all personal clothing and anything that could be considered a luxury. All prisoners to wear prison clothing. No exceptions (none). Remove TV,radio,Play stations etc from the prison completely. Remove newspapers and magazines. All visiting conducted from behind a separating wall of glass or Perspex. No parcels or gifts to be allowed. All sentences to be served are decided by the courts. The sentence passed by the court is the sentence served, no half measures for good behaviour. Good behaviour is rewarded by leaving on time at the end of the sentence. Bad behaviour adds extra time to the sentence at the end. Concurrent sentencing to be banned and offences to be added together and served as total time.  All drugs (including cigarettes) to be forbidden. Cold turkey if necessary. Make them harsh, unforgiving and austere places where comfort is non existent. Enforce and insist on basic behaviour.
